mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Nelson, Thomas, 1738-1789
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter, January 13, 1781, Williamsburg, Virginia, Thomas Nelson, Jr. to Thomas Jefferson (then Governor of Virginia) referring to British ships on the James River. References to Cobham in Surry, Milchfield, Suffolk, and Portsmouth. Mentions Benedict Arnold. 1 page - address on verso in another hand. From Mss. Acc. 2004.08, Thomas Nelson, Jr. to Thomas Jefferson Letter, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: College of William and Mary, Earl Gregg Swem Library
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Thomas Nelson, Jr. to Thomas Jefferson Letter, 1781
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Thomas Nelson, Jr. to Thomas Jefferson Letter
